title: 76. My Christmas Decor Episode! With Cami from Tidbits
description:
Join in on a fun discussion between my friend Cami and me. We talk Christmas decor as newlyweds, during renovations, in established homes and during new builds. We chat DIY decor, natural decor and themes. You will leave inspired, rather than overwhelmed! 

Follow along with Cami- 

Youtube- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_I2Ak1y0DQ7DgvFrd1KVUg 

Tidbits blog- https://www.tidbits-cami.com/ 

Instagram- https://www.instagram.com/camitidbits/ 

Cami's Victorian Farmhouse Christmas- https://www.tidbits-cami.com/victorian-farmhouse-christmas/ 

Cami's Class Red/Green Farmhouse Christmas- https://www.tidbits-cami.com/farmhouse-christmas-bedroom/ https://www.tidbits-cami.com/classic-red-green-christmas-tablescape/ 

Vintage Christmas- https://www.tidbits-cami.com/vintage-christmas/ 

Blue/White Christmas- https://www.tidbits-cami.com/blue-christmas-ideas-inspiration/ 

White Christmas- https://www.tidbits-cami.com/white-christmas-ideas-inspiration/ 

Rustic/Woodsy Christmas- https://www.tidbits-cami.com/rustic-and-woodsy-christmas-ideas/ 

Cami's Colorful Christmas- https://www.tidbits-cami.com/a-colorful-christmas-home-tour/ 

Cami's Christmas Pinterest boards- https://www.pinterest.com/tidbitscami/_saved/
